sentence: Also booked for the rally is Rep. Madison Cawthorn, the freshman congressman from the western part of the state who has angered top House Republicans after talking about orgies and cocaine.
title: Local conservatives revolt against Trump House favorite

author: Kayla Epstein
title: Trump's allies say his Twitter ban has backfired as they keep his voice loud on the social network: 'It's a net benefit'

sentence: A day after Mr. McCarthy reprimanded Representative Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina for saying that colleagues in Washington had held orgies and used cocaine, Mr. Trump awarded Mr. Cawthorn a coveted speaking slot at his next rally.
title: Mar-a-Lago Machine: Trump as a Modern-Day Party Boss

sentence: The decision by Judge Totenberg stood in stark contrast with a recent ruling in a similar case involving Representative Madison Cawthorn in North Carolina.
title: Effort to Remove Marjorie Taylor Greene From Ballot Can Proceed, Judge Says

sentence: If Madison Were Omar To the Editor: Re Police Accuse Lawmaker of Trying to Fly With Gun? (news article, April 27), about Representative Madison Cawthorn trying to bring a gun through airport security: Instead of this ultraright white man, imagine this story being about another professional American man, this one with swarthy skin and named Omar, who was twice caught trying to bring a loaded gun onto a commercial flight.
title: Tucker Carlson's Influence on America and Its Media
